description: This is a hike to two falls on the O'Toole Brook near Barr Settlement.   The first fall has a little path right to it and is about a 15ft.  the second one you need to navigate through the woods for maybe 5-10minutes.  You start at the clearing at the end of Maplewood Rd and then aim in a west direction to the fall.  You cross a small ravine to start with and then up into a mature softwood forest.  You then spot the stream and move upstream to the 30ft fall.  This fall location was given to me by fellow explorer (Andrew H.) Tks a bunch!
directions: Barr settlement Rd and turn on Maplewood Rd and park at the end.  Fall is located at N45.13263 W63.62453 and then the other smaller fall is located at N45.13710 W63.61606
title: Barr Settlement Falls
